q: Donald Rumsfeld Called Out On Lies About WMD Speaking in Atlanta today, Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld was sharply questioned about his pre-war claims about WMD in Iraq. An audience member confronted Donald Rumsfeld with his 2003 claim about WMD, We know where they are. Donald Rumsfeld falsely claimed he never said it. The audience member then read Donald Rumsfeld 's quote back to him, leaving the defense secretary speechless. There's really no one else in the universe who could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done. Chrysler emerge from bankruptcy in June 2009 and form a partnership with Fiat SpA. Advertisement That will be an accomplishment for an automaker many thought would not survive, even with bailouts. The fact that Chrysler will have positive operating profit and a positive cash flow makes them more of a comeback kid than Ford( Motor Co.) is, said Warren Browne, vice president of business development for AutomotiveCompass LLC in Northville.
